Key: What am I supposed to do...?
Hehe. Darling, let's go!
W-Wait!

Shido. You're not going to fall for Miku's
seduction, are you?
No, it's not like that...

Reminder. Please hurry and choose, Shido.
You should just take Kaguya's and Yuzuru's
hands.
What...

Shido! Let's go eat kinako bread! You wanted
to have some too, right?!
Well I guess I do, but...

Wait, Shido. I should already be in your heart.
Remember... the day you asked me out.
W-Well that was... a little trap, kind of...
(Argh! Damn it! It's not settling down!)

(I know! At a time like this... I'm going to have
to call the Fraxinus for help...)

(Whenever I run into issues, they always give me
some pointers or instructions. They should be
able to save me from this situation...!)
Kotori! Help me!
Oh, you seem to be in trouble, Shido.
Kotori!

(My little sister Kotori is the Commander of the
Fraxinus. She should be a dependable advisor at
a time like this... I think.)
Can you solve this problem for me?
Jeez, what am I going to do with you?\nI'll bring the Fraxinus around and pick you up,\nso make a run for it to the alley.
Thanks!
Awww, where are you going, darling?!
Wait, Shido!
(And that's how the Fraxinus saved me.)
Y-You saved me.

What are you doing, Shido? You know your
position, right?

You're the only one who can seal the Spirits'
powers. You have to take them out on dates.
I-I know.

There are so many things we don't know about
the Spirits. Once you seal them, it doesn't
mean they won't go berserk again...
Well... For the time being.

Well then, what's up with this? If you keep
doing what you just pulled, one day they might
get really mad and explode.
Well, uh... I couldn't help that situation.
Shut up. You jewel bug.
Jewel bug...?! Hey!

There will be more Spirits in the future.
In other words, there's a chance that their
numbers will increase.
Then... What do you want me to do?

Well, at the very least, you should have chosen
someone and gotten romance points with her.

R-Really? But if I chose one, the others
would...

You could follow up with them later. Be a man
and just deal with the situation. Then the other
girls would have been impressed with you.

Running away from all of them was likely the
worst choice. You're less than
a Bosminopsis deitersi.

...Just earlier I was an insect, but now I've devolved
into an organism? Gosh.

Shut up. Who cares. Just feel bad about what
you did!
Oof... As usual, you're such a sadist.

"(She's normally an adorable sister, but when
she's in "Commander Mode", she's so
different. Especially because of the Spirits...)"

Listen to me, Shido. Next time you run away,
I'm going to shove peanuts up your nose and
shoot them out for a high score.
What kind of game is that?! And besides...
What?
I didn't exactly go running home.
You're going to make excuses now?

No, it's not that. I didn't run from my
obligations.

Hmph. Then what might you suggest you were
doing? If you say something dumb, I swear I'm
going to kick you.
You're a Spirit too, right Kotori?
What?!
S-So what... if I am?
I made my choice. I didn't run.
Wh-Wh-Wh...

Kotori. I chose you. The question was who I was
going to date; I chose you.

(Kotori is one of the Spirits whose powers I
sealed. So this reasoning should work...!)
Wh-Wh-Wh...

You know what?! Wh-What are you talking
about?!
Agh! That's messed up!

You're so dumb! You're just coming up with a
convenient excuse!
S-Sorry...
I-I... I don't need to go on a d-date.

But... With the other Spirits' emotions being
dangerous, there's a chance that you might
be in danger too, right?

It's fine! I'M FINE! Don't worry about me!
I'll always care about you...
Huh? What did you say?

N-Nothing! Go home already! You're getting in
the way of actual work I need to do.
What? I want to know...

JUST SHUT UP! I'll drop you off near the house,
so hurry up and make some dinner.
Fine. Thanks, Kotori.
Hmph... Whatever.

(She lectured me but... I guess I can get home
safely.)
